```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
```

```{r import}
adp_df = read_excel("./data/juvenile_adp.xlsx", col_types = "text") 
```

```{r tidy}
adp_girls = adp_df %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(county, year, month, adp_pre_disposition_female, adp_post_disposition_female)
  
  
```
